name: Timeloop Fox Game (Looped Game Jam Entry)
name_original: Timeloop Fox Game (Looped Game Jam Entry)
description:
My entry to the Looped Game Jam. This is a remake of a previous game jam game of mine, from around two years ago.

You're a fox robot, the same one as last time, kinda. You're still trapped in a weird dimension where time loops in on itself. You still can't leave. Yet.

- Credit: The font 'Futura Handwritten' was created by Billy Snyder of pixelfailure.com
